sentences.en: Except for her illnesses, she had had a particularly happy childhood.
sentences.cn: 除了体弱多病外，她的童年特别幸福。

sentences.en: Except for the remarkably tidy kitchen, the place was a mess.
sentences.cn: 除了厨房特别干净外，这地方一片狼藉。

sentences.en: He hadn't eaten a thing except for one forkful of salad.
sentences.cn: 除了一餐叉色拉，他什么都没吃。

sentences.en: He's cut loose from this business except, possibly, where James is concerned.
sentences.cn: 可能除了詹姆斯外，公司里都没人能管得了他。

sentences.en: High technology equipment would be excepted from any trade agreement.
sentences.cn: 任何贸易协定都不会把高科技设备包括在内。

sentences.en: I don't take any drugs whatsoever, except aspirin for colds.
sentences.cn: 我什么药都不吃，除了感冒时吃阿司匹林。

sentences.en: I have earrings just like those, except they’re blue. ＃
sentences.cn: 我有一对耳环跟那一对很像，只是我的是蓝色的。

sentences.en: I sold everything I owned except for my car and my books.
sentences.cn: 我把我所有的东西都卖掉了，只剩下汽车和书。

sentences.en: Ida would not speak to him except to answer questions.
sentences.cn: 除了回答问题，艾达都不和他说话。

sentences.en: Money was a commodity she never thought about except in the abstract.
sentences.cn: 钱对她来说就是个抽象的东西，她从不去想钱。

sentences.en: My master ordered me not to deliver the message except in private.
sentences.cn: 我的主人命令我务必私下里传递消息。

sentences.en: She sipped the wine. Everything was hazy now, except for Nick's face.
sentences.cn: 她小口地抿着酒。现在一切都变得模糊起来，除了尼克的脸。

sentences.en: The foggy streets were virtually empty, except for the occasional evening stroller.
sentences.cn: 除了偶尔一两个傍晚出来散步的人，雾蒙蒙的街上空荡荡的。

sentences.en: The log cabin stayed empty, except when we came.
sentences.cn: 除非我们到来，要不然那间小木屋一直都是空的。

sentences.en: The office is open every day except Sundays.
sentences.cn: 办事处除星期天之外天天开门。

sentences.en: The overnight train runs every night of the week except Saturdays.
sentences.cn: 这趟夜班火车除了周六外每个晚上都运行。

sentences.en: The snow, except where it drifted, was only calf-deep.
sentences.cn: 除了吹得堆积起来的地方，雪只有小腿肚深。

sentences.en: They all howled with laughter except me.
sentences.cn: 除了我以外，他们全都哈哈大笑起来。

sentences.en: They didn't have to do anything except sit back and enjoy life.
sentences.cn: 他们只需置身事外，享受生活。

sentences.en: They were all there except me.
sentences.cn: 除了我以外他们都在那里。

sentences.en: We all went except him.
sentences.cn: 除他以外， 我们都去了。

words.tran_cn: 可反对的；可抗议的；引起反感的

trans.tran_en: used to give the reason why something was not done or did not happen
used to introduce the only person, thing, action, fact, or situation about which a statement is not true
